metadata.title: CVE-2023-51596 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: BlueZ Phone Book Access Profile Heap-based Buffer Overflow Remote CodeExecution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows network-adjacentattackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of BlueZ.User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that thetarget must connect to a malicious Bluetooth device. The specific flawexists within the handling of the Phone Book Access profile. The issueresults from the lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplieddata prior to copying it to a fixed-length heap-based buffer. An attackercan leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. WasZDI-CAN-20939.

criterions.comment: bluez package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-11-13').
